output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Makes direct reference to: - Marcel Ciolacu (presidential candidate) - Simona Bucura Oprescu (parliamentary candidate)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - This is a paid advertisement with significant reach (25,000-30,000 impressions) - Targets all pensioners and general public - Published on both Facebook and Instagram
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Promotes PSD's achievements regarding pension increases - Highlights PSD's positive actions vs "right-wing governments" - Promotes Simona Bucura Oprescu as leading PSD's parliamentary list - Associates these achievements with Marcel Ciolacu's government
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a promotional message, not journalistic content - Uses partisan language and comparisons - Includes campaign message ID (CMF)
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication - Contains structured political messaging - Paid advertisement from official party page

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Promotes both parliamentary and presidential candidates - Uses partisan messaging to influence voters - Is a paid advertisement with significant reach - Makes direct comparisons between political parties - Associates positive policy outcomes with specific political actors
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Argeș, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei pentru alegerile prezidențiale, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral plătit (ID postare Facebook: 1129170215457617) ce îl prezintă într-o lumină pozitivă pe candidatul prezidențial Marcel Ciolacu, asociindu-l cu creșterile de pensii și reformele guvernamentale. Postarea este activă și după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel perioada de restricție a propagandei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale.
